bibl.title: The Beginning and the End of the Καίσαρος κράτησις Era in Egypt.
bibl.note: The first year of the rule of Augustus in Egypt began on 8 Mesore, 30 B.C. The beginning of the year was changed from 8 Mesore back to 1 Thot in the course of Year 4 (or even earlier).
bibl.seg: SKEAT T.C., The Beginning and the End of the Καίσαρος κράτησις Era in Egypt.
The first year of the rule of Augustus in Egypt began on 8 Mesore, 30 B.C. The beginning of the year was changed from 8 Mesore back to 1 Thot in the course of Year 4 (or even earlier).
